name: aireact
description: AIReact - AI-powered React components for building intelligent applications
author: reachbrt

scripts.build: npm run build:packages && npm run build:demo
scripts.build:packages: npm run build --workspace @aireact/core && npm run build --workspace @aireact/chatbot && npm run build --workspace @aireact/autosuggest && npm run build --workspace @aireact/smartform && npm run build --workspace @aireact/analytics && npm run build --workspace @aireact/image-caption && npm run build --workspace @aireact/emotion-ui && npm run build --workspace @aireact/doc-intelligence && npm run build --workspace @aireact/predictive-input && npm run build --workspace @aireact/smart-notify && npm run build --workspace @aireact/voice-actions && npm run build --workspace @aireact/smart-datatable && npm run build --workspace @aireact/360-spin
scripts.publish:packages: npm run build:packages && npm publish --access public --workspaces --workspace packages
